metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3106 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.16-rc6. ef100_update_stats in drivers/net/ethernet/sfc/ef100_nic.c lacks check of the return value of kmalloc().

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3106` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-13-generic - 5.19.0-21.21
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-13-generic - 5.19.0-21.21
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-13-generic-64k - 5.19.0-21.21
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-aws - 5.19.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-azure - 5.19.0-1008.8
No subscription required
